text: Xavier Amorós Solà (7 April 1923 – 18 July 2022) was a Catalan politician and writer. He was a member of the Senate of Spain from 1986 to 1992. He was born in Reus, Spain. In 2004, he was honored with the Creu de Sant Jordi. Solà died on 18 July 2022 in Reus at the age of 99. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish poets Category:Spanish politicians
title: Xavier Amorós Solà
